channel.title: Uuid on Embrace Change, Shape the Future
channel.description: Recent content in Uuid on Embrace Change, Shape the Future

item.title: Make it easier to find
item.description: A look at the Tideland Go repositories shows that these today are libraries for individual topics with various packages included. One problem with this form of organization is that these packages are difficult to find. At the same time, their individual histories and their versions are tied to those of the entire library. This must be improved. Therefore, the reconstruction of these projects has now begun. The packages from the repositories move to the main level and become independent projects.
